long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SYFT - Personalized Style Filtering for Women’s Clothing

Take control of your fashion browsing experience with SYFT, the ultimate style-filtering and personalization tool for women's clothing. Designed to work seamlessly across top fashion websites on a limited set of websites (Shown in the Privacy Policy), SYFT helps you discover clothing that perfectly aligns with your unique style and the latest trends.

Features:
Advanced Style Diagnostic Quiz: Pinpoint your style with our in-depth quiz and get personalized recommendations tailored to your preferences.
Style-Filtering Tab: Instantly filter clothes based on your personal style—whether you're into minimalist, edgy, vintage, or any other vibe.
Trend Analysis: Keep up with the latest fashion trends and filter clothes that match current must-haves.
Product Description Page (PDP) Direction: Click on any product, and you'll be directly taken to its detailed description page for a seamless shopping experience.
SYFT is currently in its Alpha version, and we welcome your feedback! Please report any bugs, suggest new features, or request additional storefronts you'd like to see SYFT support in the future. We are continuously updating the extension, and our Beta version will be launching soon.

For any questions or concerns, feel free to contact us at ajay@syft.style.
